name: Downgrooves
description: Downgrooves is the production duo of Eric Rylos and Mario Perez.  The duo produce a variety of electronic dance music.

name: Eric Rylos
description: Downgrooves producer Eric Rylos produces ambient & downtempo music under his own name.

name: Evotone
description: Downgrooves producer Eric Rylos produces organic & minimal under the alias Evotone.
